ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Resist question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I haven t kept track of how much the tap is taking per cast, but with resistances I ve never saved completely outright.  My tactic over this weekend for
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 20 Mar 2000, Reeves, Patrick W wrote:

> I have been rethinking song tactics on uber-mobs as well. Over the weekend
> we took on Maestro. The first time we went my standard MR boosting songs
> (Guardian+Mystic). After we collected our bodies I decided to try John's
> idea (Purifying+Niv's+Hymn). We took him down and there were no loses in
> our group. A question here on the AE lifetap, is it a save vs magic or
> something else?

I haven't kept track of how much the tap is taking per cast, but with
resistances I've never saved completely outright. My tactic over this
weekend for the two fights we had against him were to weave verses and
niv's, I had trouble adding a third with the number of people there.

Athren
